Lab Operator.description: Checks if user can login to Clarity LIMS
Checks if role can assign a sample to a workflow in Clarity LIMS.
Checks if a user can move to the next step in Clarity LIMS.
Lab Operator.error:
TimeoutError: Locator.text_content: Timeout 30000ms exceeded.
Call log:
  - waiting for locator("div.sub-work:has-text('Step 1 » Aneuploidy - Plasma Isolation')").first
